Questions.question_en: Who was sent to Lanka in the Sundara Kanda to search for Sita?
Questions.question_sa: सुन्दरकाण्डे सीतायाः अन्वेषणायः कः लङ्कां प्रेषितः?

Questions.question_en: Who gave the ring of Rama to Hanuman for identification?
Questions.question_sa: रामस्य मुद्रिकां हनूमते परिचयार्थं कः दत्तवान्?

Questions.question_en: On which mountain did Hanuman leap across the ocean?
Questions.question_sa: हनुमान् कस्य पर्वतस्य उपरि स्थित्वा सागरं लङ्घितवान्?

Questions.question_en: Who tested Hanuman’s strength in the ocean by assuming the form of a mountain?
Questions.question_sa: सागरमध्ये पर्वतस्वरूपं धृत्वा हनूमतः बलं कः परीक्षितवान्?

Questions.question_en: Which demoness tried to swallow Hanuman in the ocean?
Questions.question_sa: सागरमध्ये हनूमन्तं निगलितुं या राक्षसी प्रयतिता सा काऽभूत्?

Questions.question_en: Whom did Hanuman first meet in Lanka?
Questions.question_sa: लङ्कायां प्रविश्य हनुमान् प्रथमं कं ददर्श ?

Questions.question_en: Who was the demon-king ruling Lanka during Sundara Kanda?
Questions.question_sa: सुन्दरकाण्डे लङ्कायाः राक्षसराजः कः आसीत्?

Questions.question_en: Who was Ravana’s virtuous brother who later joined Rama?
Questions.question_sa: रावणस्य धर्मात्मा भ्राता यः पश्चात् रामं सेवे तस्य नाम किम्?

Questions.question_en: Who was guarding Ashoka Vatika where Sita was kept?
Questions.question_sa: अशोकवाटिकां रक्षति स्म, यत्र सीता आसीत्, सा का?

Questions.question_en: What did Hanuman give to Sita as proof of his identity?
Questions.question_sa: हनुमान् स्वस्य परिचयस्य प्रमाणरूपेण सीतायै किं दत्तवान्?

Questions.question_en: Who consoled Sita in Ashoka Vatika with her dream of Rama’s victory?
Questions.question_sa: अशोकवाटिकायाम् सीतां रामविजयस्वप्नेन या सान्त्वयत् सा का?

Questions.question_en: Which ornament did Sita give Hanuman as proof for Rama?
Questions.question_sa: रामाय प्रमाणरूपेण सीतया हनूमते कः आभरणः दत्तः?

Questions.question_en: What did Hanuman burn in Lanka with his fiery tail?
Questions.question_sa: हनूमतः दीप्तलाङ्गुलेन लङ्कायां किम् दग्धम्?

Questions.question_en: Who praised Hanuman’s heroic acts after he returned from Lanka?
Questions.question_sa: लङ्कातः आगत्य हनूमतः वीर्यकर्माणि के प्रशशंसुः?

Questions.question_en: Who is the author of Sundara Kanda in Valmiki Ramayana?
Questions.question_sa: वाल्मीकि-रामायणे सुन्दरकाण्डस्य कर्ता कः?

Questions.question_en: How did Hanuman reduce his size to enter Lanka?
Questions.question_sa: लङ्कां प्रवेष्टुं हनुमान् किमर्थं स्वस्वरूपं लघूकृतवान्?

Questions.question_en: What was Hanuman’s initial thought upon seeing Sita in Ashoka Vatika?
Questions.question_sa: अशोकवाटिकायां सीतां दृष्ट्वा हनुमतः प्रथमा भावना का आसीत्?
options_en: To return to Rama at once

Questions.question_en: What was Sita’s reaction on seeing Hanuman?
Questions.question_sa: हनूमन्तं दृष्ट्वा सीतायाः कः भावः अभवत्?

Questions.question_en: What doubt did Sita initially have about Hanuman when she first saw him?
Questions.question_sa: प्रथमं दृष्ट्वा हनूमन्तं सीतायाः का शङ्का आसीत्?
options_en: That he was Ravana in disguise
Questions.answer_en: That he was Ravana in disguise

Questions.question_en: Who attempted to kill Hanuman when he was in Ravana’s court?
Questions.question_sa: रावणस्य सभायां हनूमन्तं हन्तुं कः प्रयत्नवान्?

Questions.question_en: Who suggested setting Hanuman’s tail on fire?
Questions.question_sa: हनूमतः पुच्छं दग्धुं कः उपदिष्टवान्?

Questions.question_en: What did Hanuman advise Ravana when he first spoke in the court?
Questions.question_sa: प्रथमं सभायां भाषमाणः हनूमान् रावणं किम् उपदिशत्?

Questions.question_en: How did Hanuman make himself visible to Sita in Ashoka Vatika?
Questions.question_sa: हनूमान् अशोकवाटिकायां सीतायै आत्मानं कथं प्रकटितवान्?

Questions.question_en: What did Sita request Hanuman not to do when he offered to carry her away?
Questions.question_sa: हनूमता नीतुं यच्छता सीता किं निवृत्त्य प्रार्थयत्?
options_en: Not to carry her without Rama
Questions.answer_en: Not to carry her without Rama

Questions.question_en: Which demoness tried to frighten Sita in Ashoka Vatika?
Questions.question_sa: अशोकवाटिकायां सीतां त्रासयितुं का राक्षसी प्रयत्नवती?

Questions.question_en: Which weapon did Indrajit use to capture Hanuman?
Questions.question_sa: हनूमतः ग्रहणाय इन्द्रजिदा कः अस्त्रः प्रयुक्तः?

Questions.question_en: Which special power did Hanuman use to cross the ocean?
Questions.question_sa: समुद्रं तीर्तुं हनूमान् का विशेषशक्तिः उपयुज्यत?

Questions.question_en: What did Hanuman first assume before entering Lanka to avoid detection?
Questions.question_sa: लङ्कां प्रविश्य निगूढः स्थातुं हनूमान् प्रथमं किं रूपं धारितवान्?

Questions.question_en: What message did Hanuman convey from Rama to Sita?
Questions.question_sa: रामस्य कः सन्देशः हनुमता सीतायै प्रदत्तः?
options_en: He will come soon to rescue her
Questions.answer_en: He will come soon to rescue her

Questions.question_en: How did Hanuman identify Sita in Ashoka Vatika?
Questions.question_sa: अशोकवाटिकायां हनुमान् सीतां कथं ज्ञातवान्?

Questions.question_en: Who first informed Ravana that Hanuman had entered Lanka?
Questions.question_sa: हनुमान् लङ्कां प्रविष्टवानिति प्रथमं रावणाय को निवेदितवान्?

Questions.question_en: What promise did Sita give to Hanuman regarding her survival?
Questions.question_sa: जीवने विषये सीतया हनुमते किं प्रतिज्ञातम्?
options_en: She would wait for one month
Questions.answer_en: She would wait for one month

Questions.question_en: What boon did Brahma grant that allowed Hanuman to remain bound only temporarily by Brahmastra?
Questions.question_sa: ब्रह्मास्त्रेण केवलं क्षणिकं बद्धः इति हनुमतः कृते ब्रह्मणा कः वरः दत्तः?

Questions.question_en: On which Mountain was the Lanka kingdom built?
Questions.question_sa: कस्मिन् पर्वते लङ्काराज्यं निर्मितम् आसीत् ?

Questions.question_en: Who reminded Hanuman about his strength?
Questions.question_sa: हनुमते बलं केन स्मारयत् ?
